title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Wednesday, August 23 (game #576)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: New Black Myth: Wukong trailer debuts at Gamescom 2023
description: A brand-new trailer for Black Myth: Wukong has been revealed.

title: Apple's smart ring may let you control your iPhone and desktop with a few touches
description: A US patent reveals Apple has redesigned its smart ring to now include a "jewel" to house many of its features.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 reveals two new playable characters and two new Kameo Fighters
description: Two new Fighters and two more Kameo Fighters were revealed for Mortal Kombat 1 during Gamescom's Opening Night Live.

title: Alan Wake 2 gets new in-game footage
description: Much anticipated horror game Alan Wake 2 has received some brand new preview footage, debuted at Gamescom 2023.

title: Killing Floor 3 officially announced in gory trailer at Gamescom
description: Killing Floor 3 has been announced, and is releasing on PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

title: Delta Force: Hawk Ops gets full reveal in explosive new trailer
description: Delta Force: Hawk Ops just got a full reveal during Gamescom's Opening Night Live.

title: Sonic Superstars gets new gameplay trailer and October release date
description: Sonic Superstars will release on October 17 with four-player co-op.

title: Soulslike action RPG Lords of the Fallen gets new preview at Gamescom
description: Promising soulslike RPG Lords of the Fallen has received brand new preview footage, showcasing Hexworks' dark fantasy universe.

title: Granblue Fantasy: Relink secures February 2024 launch date
description: Granblue Fantasy: Relink has an official release date.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty gets new trailer in Gamescom opening ceremony
description: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty has received a new preview trailer in the run up to its release in September.

title: Crimson Desert shows off loads of action in feature-filled trailer at Gamescom 2023
description: The first gameplay trailer for the open-world RPG Crimson Desert has been revealed.

title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar RTS release date revealed along with new faction
description: The first-ever Age of Sigmar RTS finally has a release date, alongside a reveal for its third faction: the Nighthaunt.

title: New Black Myth: Wukong gameplay trailer debuts at Gamescom 2023
description: A brand-new trailer for Black Myth: Wukong has been revealed.

title: Little Nightmares 3 receives haunting first trailer at Gamescom Opening Night Live
description: Little Nightmares 3 has received its first trailer and a release window at Gamescom opening night.

title: Zack Snyder's Rebel Moon is Netflix's answer to Star Wars – and it looks pretty good, actually
description: The first teaser trailer for Rebel Moon, Zack Snyder's new Netflix movie, has debuted online.

title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage gets a new trailer at Opening Night Live 2023
description: Assassin's Creed Mirage just got a new trailer during Gamescom's Opening Night Live.

title: Microsoft Edge is getting a new AI feature that will improve your search results
description: Microsoft Edge's updated roadmap revealed several new AI features that are set to improve search results and more.

title: New Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 trailer reveals first look at campaign missions
description: New in-game footage for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 has been revealed, showing the fast-paced FPS in action.

title: Open-world survival game Nightingale gets 2024 early-access release date
description: Nightingale is set to release in early access on Steam and the Epic Games Store on February 22, 2024.

title: Tekken 8 gets a January 2024 release date, alongside a new trailer and game mode
description: Tekken 8 will be releasing on January 26, 2024, it's been confirmed.

title: Samsung reveals phone displays of the future – and they could be heading to iPhones too
description: Samsung just previewed the bezel-less OLED displays that could be coming to your future iPhone.

title: Cult of the Lamb celebrates one-year anniversary with Don’t Starve Together crossover
description: Devolver Digital has announced Cult of the Lamb will be getting its first-ever game collaboration with Don’t Starve Together.

title: Nvidia explains how its ACE software will bring ChatGPT-like AI to non-player characters in games
description: Nvidia has revealed improvements to its ‘custom AI model foundry’, which will allow injections of AI to NPCs in games.

title: Google Pixel 8a: latest news, rumors, and everything we know so far
description: There might not be a Google Pixel 8a, but here's everything we know so far about this potential phone.

title: The Atari 2600 is being recreated for modern audiences
description: Atari and Plaion have revealed the Atari 2600+, a "modern-day faithful creation" of the company's first home console.

title: Threads web version arrives – but it’s still missing key features
description: Threads has been shedding users in recent times – will desktop PC folks help to stem those losses?

title: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet DLC adds new spooky Pokémon Poltchageist
description: Game Freak reveals that Pokémon Scarlet and Violet's upcoming DLC will feature a brand-new spooky Pokémon called Poltchageist.

title: Garmin could soon supercharge your sleep tracking with rumored coach feature
description: Sleep Coach feature may arrive with imminent Garmin Venu 3 – and hopefully will come to older Garmin watches, too.

title: Bitwarden launches a new manager for business secrets
description: Bitwarden has launched its Secrets Manager in general availability, which it says will plug any leaks at your firm.

title: Microsoft and Nvidia join forces as PC Game Pass titles come to GeForce Now
description: Nvidia has broadened its GeForce Now service to include Microsoft PC Game Pass titles as the start of a new collaboration.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 Lae'zel voice actor hits back at character criticism
description: Devora Wilde, the voice actor behind Baldur's Gate 3's Lae'zel, has responded to player's mean tweets about her character.

title: Fake versions of Google Bard are spreading malware
description: A highly suspicious Facebook ad was recently discovered, posing as Google Bard.

title: Microsoft intends to sell Activision Blizzard streaming rights to Ubisoft to counter monopoly concerns
description: In an effort to appease the UK mergers regulator, Microsoft has offered to sell streaming rights for Activision Blizzard games to Ubisoft.

title: Xbox Series X console wraps are coming and a Starfield design is first
description: Microsoft has announced that new Xbox Series X console wraps are coming that include a new Starfield variant in November.

title: Nvidia forges ahead with DLSS 3.5, new game support, and… Half-Life?!
description: DLSS 3.5 will offer the clever new 'Ray Reconstruction' feature, but that's not all Nvidia has in its bag of tricks right now.

title: Seiko is apparently the latest victim of the BlackCat ransomware
description: The watchmaker said someone stole sensitive data, and BlackCat posted samples on its leak site.

title: Mystery Fitbit tracker hinted at in FCC filing – here's what it could be
description: A surprise new Fitbit device could be en route later this year, according to an FFC regulatory filing. And here's what could it be.

title: Watch out for this very convincing Amazon ad on Google - it's a trap
description: A fake ad for Amazon was being shown at the top of Google's search engine results page, hiding a devious payload.

title: Microsoft’s latest trick for Edge could be the closest Windows 10 users get to Copilot AI
description: While Windows 10 is not getting the Copilot AI, detaching the Edge sidebar could be a kind of substitute for it.

title: Elon Musk makes another annoying change to X - this time messing with everyone's news
description: Say goodbye to the headline - X may scrap current formats for articles.

title: Watching live channels on YouTube TV just got easier with this new free update
description: The newly designed live Channel Guide on YouTube TV looks and works just like the one on Google TV.

title: iPhone 15 could come with sturdy, colorful cables in an Apple phone first
description: Apple is rumored to be introducing new colorful, braided USB-C cables to the iPhone 15 series when they debut.

title: Samsung is rumored to be making a more affordable pair of Galaxy Buds
description: A new leak suggests that Samsung might be quietly working on an improved version of its superb Galaxy Buds 2.

title: Gamescom Opening Night Live 2023 start time and how to watch
description: Here's how to watch Gamescom Opening Night Live 2023, what to expect, and when it kicks off.

title: Proton launches new business VPN
description: New dedicated business plans provide the security, flexibility and customization to suit all sizes of organization. Here's all you need to know.

title: iPhone 15 Pro Max could face worrying delays – and its cameras are to blame
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max is reportedly facing production delays due to sensor shortages.

title: The OnePlus 12 could have a major feature the OnePlus 11 lacks
description: A big OnePlus 12 specs leak points to water resistance, a very bright screen, a premium build, a massive battery, and more.

title: OnePlus Open tipped to beat the Z Fold 5 with the best foldable screen so far
description: The OnePlus Open foldable looks set to beat its Samsung rival when it comes to some key display specs.

title: Intel Core i7-14700K leak gives us a load of benchmarks – and it looks a tempting CPU
description: Core i7-14700K processor handily outdoes its predecessor, and this is with a sample version of the CPU.

title: Your lightbulbs can be hacked to breach your Wi-Fi network
description: A popular smart lightbulb carried multiple vulnerabilities which could be abused by hackers, researchers claim.

title: Astarion's voice actor in Baldur's Gate 3 was unaware the model was being used for the bear scene
description: In a recent interview, Neil Newbon explained that while he directed the bear scene in Baldur's Gate 3, he was unaware that the Astarion model would be used during it.

title: Free-to-play battle royale Stumble Guys will be coming to PlayStation
description: A new colorful knockout battle royale is making its way to consoles.

title: Nintendo confirms Super Mario Bros. Wonder will not include Charles Martinet
description: The iconic Charles Martinet, will not appear in Super Mario Bros. Wonder.
